Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Lomustine is approved to be used alone or with other drugs to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Brain tumors. It is used in patients who have already been treated with surgery or radiation therapy.
Hodgkin lymphoma. It is used with chemotherapy in patients whose disease got worse after other types of treatment.

Section.Para: Lomustine is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
